sentences.english: The charming landscape which I saw this morning, is indubitably made up of some twenty or thirty farms.
sentences.chinese: 今晨我見迷人景色，無疑由二十至三十個農場組成。

sentences.english: Received your E mail this morning thanking Mr. Hitching Wang for something he's done for you.
sentences.chinese: 今晨接到一封你寄給王志成先生的致謝函。

sentences.english: An auction of Greek 6-month government debt was also given a lukewarm reception this morning.
sentences.chinese: 希臘今晨拍賣的6個月政府債券也遇冷。

sentences.english: I take the train to go to work this morning and the conductor did not want to take my train ticket.
sentences.chinese: 今晨我程火車上班，車掌先生不要剪我的車票。

sentences.english: This morning, the Japanese attacked Midway Island.
sentences.chinese: 今晨日本人襲擊了中途島。

sentences.english: This morning I composed this ritual based on the ritual honoring Green Tara.
sentences.chinese: 今晨我以綠度母護摩儀軌爲底本敬造了此儀軌。

sentences.english: And this morning, the Japanese attacked Midway Island.
sentences.chinese: 今晨，日本人進攻了中途島。

sentences.english: PS Wang meeting: Ambassador Huntsman called on Party Secretary Wang Yang and Mayor Wan at Zhudao this morning.
sentences.chinese: 大使今晨在珠島賓館與省委書記汪洋及萬市長會面。

sentences.english: And so I write, like this morning under the tree.
sentences.chinese: 我因此寫作，就象今晨在這棵樹下。

sentences.english: That's the question at the Stamford Hotel this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這是今晨斯坦福德賓館的一個謎。

sentences.english: We confirm our telegram of this morning as per enclosed copy.
sentences.chinese: 按所附文本，茲確認今晨我方發出的電報。

sentences.english: Zhang Tao got up late this morning. He( )( )school.
sentences.chinese: 張濤今晨起牀晚了，他跑去學校的。

sentences.english: Finally in the morning breeze, sad leafage this morning without sound on earth.
sentences.chinese: 終於在今晨陰陰的晨風之中，悄無聲音的灑落人間。

sentences.english: Zhang Tao got up late this morning. He(ran )(to )school.
sentences.chinese: 張濤今晨起牀晚了，他跑去學校的。

sentences.english: Millions of people gazed skywards this morning to see the first total lunar eclipse for nearly three years.
sentences.chinese: 今晨，上萬民衆注視天空，觀看近三年來首次月全食。

sentences.english: They went on a binge last night and didn't get back until 3in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚他們出去飲酒作樂，直到今晨3點鐘纔回來。

definition: very early in the morning/in the wee hours
precipitation over a large area/widespread rain
day after day/for several days running
